item.description:
Shock waves in conservation laws and reaction-diffusion equations

Classes:
  • March - June 2023. Tuesday, 1pm - 3pm and Friday, 9am - 11am
  • Room 866, Department of Mathematics, Edifio Leme, PUC-Rio
Material:
  • My (handwritten) notes: Lect1: slides, lectures on wave equation Lect2-4, lectures on conservation laws Lect5-7.
  • Problem-solving sessions: Session1.
  • Exam: list of questions.
  • Books:
    • J. Smoller ‘‘Shock waves and reaction-diffusion equations’’, PDF
    • C. Dafermos ‘‘Hyberbolic conservation laws in continuum physics’’, PDF
    • L.C. Evans ‘‘Partial differential equations’’, PDE
  • Video lectures on Youtube closely related to the course:
    • Constantine Dafermos, course of 9 lectures at IMPA Hyberbolic conservation laws
    • Henri Berestycki, mini course of 4 lectures at IMPA Reaction-diffusion propagation non-homogenous media
Exercises:
  • List1. Deadline: 24 of March 2023
  • List2. Deadline: 7 of April 2023
  • List3. Deadline: 28 of April 2023
